item.title: typescript runtime typechecking
item.description: I’ve found equivalent of babel-plugin-tcomb for TypeScript - https://github.com/fabiandev/ts-runtime I’ve found it in this thread - https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/1573#issuecomment-309359559
